messages.subject: H/sing only child
messages.msgSnippet: Sherry My daughter is 12yrs old and we have only been H/sing for 6 months. When we are actually studying - Which isnt often these days! - I find the one on one
messages.messageBody:
Sherry
My daughter is 12yrs old and we have only been H/sing for 6 months.
When we are actually studying - Which isnt often these days! - I find
the one on one really good. But from the social side, yes she does
get lonely. Luckily she has a friend who lives across the road.
However this friend is busy with home work and after school
activities so they cant always hang around together. Toni is getting
better at occupying herself these days - but still likes company.
Toni does have older brothers and sisters - but they have all left
home.
Marianne
